content:
SoapProtocolVersion Enum

Definition

Specifies the version of the SOAP protocol used to communicate with an XML Web service.

In this Article

public enum SoapProtocolVersion
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
SoapProtocolVersion

Remarks

The Default member has a different meaning for clients than it does for XML Web services. For details, see the SoapVersion and SoapVersion properties.

Fields

Default

The default value for this enumeration.
Soap11

SOAP protocol version 1.1.
Soap12

SOAP protocol version 1.2.
